languages.text: "Я не стану оправдываться. Тебе достаточно знать, что более в таком состоянии ты меня не увидишь. Теперь говори, зачем именно ты приш{mf|ел|ла}
"I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."
languages.original_text: "Я не стану оправдываться. Тебе достаточно знать, что более в таком состоянии ты меня не увидишь. Теперь говори, зачем именно ты приш{mf|ел|ла}

traits.locale_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Me niego a pedir disculpas. Tendrás que conformarte con saber que nunca volverás a verme en ese estado. Y ahora dime para qué has venido».
languages.original_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."

traits.locale_text: «Me niego a pedir disculpas. Tendrás que conformarte con saber que nunca volverás a verme en ese estado. Y ahora dime para qué has venido».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「謝罪するつもりはない。もう二度とあのような状態の我を見ることはない、ということで満足してもらうしかない。それで、なぜここに来たのだ？」
languages.original_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."

traits.locale_text: 「謝罪するつもりはない。もう二度とあのような状態の我を見ることはない、ということで満足してもらうしかない。それで、なぜここに来たのだ？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我拒绝以任何形式道歉，而你应该感到满意，因为我再也不会在你面前那个样子了。好了，告诉我，你为什么来这里。”
languages.original_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."

traits.locale_text: “我拒绝以任何形式道歉，而你应该感到满意，因为我再也不会在你面前那个样子了。好了，告诉我，你为什么来这里。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je refuse de vous présenter des excuses. Je peux simplement vous garantir que vous ne me verrez plus jamais dans cet état et vous devrez vous en contenter. À présent, dites-moi ce que vous faites ici. »
languages.original_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."

traits.locale_text: « Je refuse de vous présenter des excuses. Je peux simplement vous garantir que vous ne me verrez plus jamais dans cet état et vous devrez vous en contenter. À présent, dites-moi ce que vous faites ici. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde mich nicht entschuldigen. Ihr müsst Euch mit dem Wissen begnügen, dass Ihr mich nie wieder in diesem Zustand sehen werdet. Und nun sagt mir, warum Ihr gekommen seid."
languages.original_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mich nicht entschuldigen. Ihr müsst Euch mit dem Wissen begnügen, dass Ihr mich nie wieder in diesem Zustand sehen werdet. Und nun sagt mir, warum Ihr gekommen seid."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."

languages.text: "Özürlerimi iletmeyi reddediyorum. Beni bu vaziyette bir daha asla görmeyeceğin gerçeğiyle yetinmen gerekecek. Şimdi bana buraya neden geldiğini söyle."
languages.original_text: "I refuse to offer any apology. You will have to content yourself with the knowledge that you will never see me in that state again. Now tell me why you have come."

traits.locale_text: "Özürlerimi iletmeyi reddediyorum. Beni bu vaziyette bir daha asla görmeyeceğin gerçeğiyle yetinmen gerekecek. Şimdi bana buraya neden geldiğini söyle."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
